title: Necromancer azir's voice, is half alternative/normal voice
body:
Hi,
I bought **Necromancer Azir skin**, and, since a few days, I noticed that his **voice** with this skin sounds like a "necromancer" on some sentences, and is just "vanilla azir voice" on other sentences.
So Azir sounds like **two different people** during the game, and I know it hasn't always been like this.
I think the voice is one of the main feature of the skin and I hope this bug will be fixed soon.

replies.body:
Hey IronRipperOo! 

Thanks for the report! Unfortunately, it's a bit too late to get this in for the next patch, but we'll do our best to get this resolved ASAP! :)
